stimulusHtml: Dr. Jones was interested in how personality traits are related to everyday behaviors. Her data collected from participants were gathered and presented in a scatterplot. Which of the following statements is correct for the data?
choicesHtml: The correlation between conscientiousness and how many days one makes their bed is negative.
The correlation between conscientiousness and how many days one makes their bed is positive.
The correlation between conscientiousness and how many days one makes their bed is statistically significant.
Conscientiousness causes individuals to make their bed more often.
